name: Covered cup (gobelet à lait couvercle)
maker: Painting attributed to Christian Gotthelf Grossman, Sèvres Manufactory
description: Covered cup (gobelet à lait couvercle); Painting attributed to Christian Gotthelf Grossman (German, 1737 - 1786), Sèvres Manufactory (French, 1756 - present); Sèvres, France; about 1760 - 1765; Soft paste porcelain, painted with camaïeu rose enamel decoration and gilding; 9.1 × 14 × 9.7 cm (3 9/16 × 5 1/2 × 3 13/16 in.); 87.DE.134.1; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
